LanguageData.AnimalInsanitySingle: Um {0} teve um colápso e irá atacar qualquer coisa que ver.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanityMultiple: Algum tipo de onda psíquica se abateu sobre a paisagem. Seus colonos estão bem, mas...\n\nParece que muita dos {0}s na área têm sido levado à loucura.
LanguageData.CropBlight: Uma praga misteriosa destruiu sua plantação.
LanguageData.EclipseIncident: Uma das luas do planeta tem orbitado em frente ao sol. Um eclipse começou.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidWalkIn: Um grupo de {0} do {1} chegarão na colonia.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidEdgeDrop: Um grupo de {0} do {1} chegarão da orbita na sua colonia em capsulas.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidCenterDrop: Um grupo de {0} do {1} caíram da orbita na frente de sua colonia em capsulas!
LanguageData.EnemyRaidStageThenAttack: Eles vão se preparar, e atacarão.\n\nPrepare uma defesa ou ataque desprevinido.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidBesiege: Parece que vão tentar fazer um cerco na colônia.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidWalkIn: Um grupo amigável {0} de {1} chegarão na colonia.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidEdgeDrop: Um grupo amigável {0} de {1} caíram da orbita na sua colonia.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidCenterDrop: Um grupo amigável {0} de {1} caíram da orbita na frente de sua colonia em capsulas!
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidStageThenAttack: Eles vão se preparar por um tempo e depois irão lhe ajudar.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidImmediateAttack: Eles estão se movendo para ajudá-lo imediatamente.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidBesiege: Parece que estão preparando uma tática de cerco antes de atacar.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash: You've detected an escape pod crashing hard nearby.\n\nIf anyone survived the impact, they'll be badly wounded.
LanguageData.CargoPodCrash: You have detected a cluster of cargo pods crashing nearby.\n\nPerhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuit: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged in an electrical explosion.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasLarge: This large amount of power has created an explosion of considerable size.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasHuge: That really is a huge explosion. Wow.
LanguageData.LetterSolarFlare:
A solar flare has begun.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

It should pass in about a day.
LanguageData.LetterHeatWave: An unusual heat wave has begun. Watch out for heat stroke.
LanguageData.LetterColdSnap: An unusual cold snap has set in. Watch out for hypothermia and dying crops.
LanguageData.TraderArrival: A trade ship is passing nearby.\n\nThey are known as {0}. They are a {1}.
LanguageData.SingleTravelerPassing: A {0} from {1} is passing by. HECAP is named {2}.
LanguageData.GroupTravelersPassing: A group of travelers from {0} are passing by.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrives: A {0} from {1} is visiting the colony.\n\nHECAP is named {2}.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArrive: A group from {0} are visiting the colony.
LanguageData.WandererJoin: A {0} named NAME has arrived and is joining the colony. HECAP is a {1}.
LanguageData.SpaceshipPartCrash:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists can feel it in the back of their mind, exhorting unspeakable acts. It must have an onboard AI persona with psychic projection ability. And this AI is not friendly.

Destroy it as soon as possible.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalInsanityPulse: The ancient structure has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven nearby animals mad.
LanguageData.LetterShipPartDroveColonistInsane: The crashed ship part has emitted a focused psychic pulse that has driven colonist {0} insane.
LanguageData.LetterPsychicDroneLevelIncreased: The crashed ship part is now emanating a more powerful kind of psychic drone. Every humanoid in the area now feels more disturbed, terrified, and paranoid.
LanguageData.LetterAgentRevealed: {0} has been revealed as an agent of your enemy {1}.\n\nThey are attempting to escape now.
LanguageData.LetterIncidentPsychicDrone: Every colonist of the {0} gender winces in pain!\n\nSome distant engine of hatred is stirring. It is projecting a powerful psychic drone over this entire region, on a frequency that only seems to affect the {0} gender. For a few days, some people's mood will be quite a bit worse.
LanguageData.BeaversArrived: A group of hungry alphabeavers has just arrived.\n\nTry to eliminate them before they decimate every last tree in the region.
